short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you auto accept on esportal.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension helps enhance the ESportal.com user experience. The extension will help you to accept a game automatically once in gaming que. If you know that you always will accept and play the games you que for, this is the perfect tool to help you with this.

After installing, the extension will help you to click the "Accept button".
